description: Core Set Measures for Mental Health data includes a range of mental health and substance use-related quality measures that state Medicaid programs are required to report to the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). These measures are part of CMS’s effort to improve behavioral health outcomes and are drawn from both the Child and Adult Core Sets.
name: mh-core-set-measures

resources.description: Mental Health Core Set Measure data contains rates for Core Set Measures by county and year: AMM-AD, APP-CH, FUH-AD, FUH-CH, SAA-AD.
resources.name: mental-health-core-set-measure-rates-by-county

fields.description:
Four-digit year representing the measurement year.

e.g. "2022"
fields.name: Measure_Year
fields.title: Measure_Year

fields.description:
Core set measure denominator type.

*  "Core Set" = denominator created from measure-eligible Medi-Cal population with no additional filtering.
*  "MHP" = Core Set population with one or more specialty mental health services (SMHS) rendered in the measurement year. 
* “MCP”= Core Set population not identified as receiving SMHS in the measurement year.
fields.name: Type
fields.title: Type

fields.description:
Core set measure numerator type.

e.g. 7-day or 30-day follow up, treatment phases
fields.name: Category
fields.title: Category

fields.description:
MHP County name or Statewide.

e.g. "Alameda".  CA_Medi-Cal is the statewide rate for measure-eligible Medi-Cal members.
fields.name: Population
fields.title: Population

fields.description: Number of members that met the numerator's measure specification.
fields.name: Numerator
fields.title: Numerator

fields.description:
Flag to indicate if data was suppressed or not.

* "1" = data suppressed because value is between 1 - 10 members.
* "2" = complementary data suppressed to prevent backwards calculation.
fields.name: Numerator_ANNOT
fields.title: Numerator_ANNOT

fields.description: Number of members that were measure-eligible (met the denominator's measure specification).
fields.name: Denominator
fields.title: Denominator

fields.description:
Flag to indicate if data was suppressed or not.

* "1" = data suppressed because value is between 1 - 10 members.
* "2" = complementary data suppressed to prevent backwards calculation.
fields.name: Denominator_ANNOT
fields.title: Denominator_ANNOT

fields.description:
Flag to indicate if data was suppressed or not.

* "1" = data suppressed because value of numerator or denominator is between 1 - 10 members.
* "2" = complementary data suppressed to prevent backwards calculation.
fields.name: Rate_ANNOT
fields.title: Rate_ANNOT

sources.title: Mental Health Core Set Measure Rates by County

resources.title: Mental Health Core Set Measure Rates by County

sources.name: Data Analytics Division, Data Science Branch

title: Core Set Measures for Mental Health
